alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Dallas; Jasper; Lucas; Madison; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Polk; Poweshiek; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 6:24PM CST until December 15 at 7:30PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Monroe County in south central Iowa... Northern Lucas County in south central Iowa... Western Poweshiek County in central Iowa... Polk County in central Iowa... Eastern Madison County in south central Iowa... Marion County in south central Iowa... Western Mahaska County in south central Iowa... Jasper County in central Iowa... Northern Clarke County in south central Iowa... Eastern Dallas County in central Iowa... Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 730 PM CST. * At 623 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Slater to near New Virginia, moving east at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Melcher-Dallas around 640 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Baxter and Rock Creek Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 39 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 101. Interstate 80 between mile markers 118 and 189. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central and central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Dallas; Jasper; Lucas; Madison; Mahaska; Marion; Monroe; Polk; Poweshiek; Warren
